ideas.title: Waitlist Manager Pro
ideas.subtitle: Smart waitlist management for events, launches, and restaurants
ideas.description: A comprehensive waitlist management system that helps businesses manage sign-ups, send automated updates, and reduce no-shows.
ideas.problem: Businesses struggle with manual waitlist management and poor customer communication.
ideas.solution: Automated system that manages waitlists and keeps customers informed.

ideas.title: Social Proof Notifications
ideas.subtitle: Boost conversions with real-time purchase notifications
ideas.description: A widget for e-commerce sites that displays recent purchases and sign-ups to build trust and urgency.
ideas.problem: E-commerce sites lack social proof to build customer trust.
ideas.solution: Real-time notifications showing recent customer activity.

ideas.title: Home Inventory Manager
ideas.subtitle: Insurance-ready home inventory management
ideas.description: Mobile-first app for cataloging household items with photos and receipts for insurance purposes.
ideas.problem: Homeowners struggle to document possessions for insurance claims.
ideas.solution: Easy-to-use app for organizing and documenting household items.
